Name: Trapper's Delight
About the game: Developer's Notes Trapper's Delight was originally envisioned as a party game. So we recommend that you gather your friends for a couch-play experience or play with them online. Please keep in mind that as an indie game with a small player base, it is not always possible to find players online. About the game Trapper's Delight is a game where players create a gauntlet of lethal contraptions and secret traps. Once all of the traps are in place, players have to try and navigate the traps in real-time along with the other competitors. To score points in Trapper's Delight , players will need to reach the goal safely. To prevent others from scoring, create the most devious traps possible... but make sure you can navigate past them too! Feature Overview Local Multiplayer for 2-4 players (Requires at least one controller) Online Multiplayer for 2-4 players Single-player Challenge Mode with 48 Puzzle Levels 28 Traps and Tiles to place In-game Replays Player customisation including lots of hats! Create new multiplayer and challenge levels with the level editor and share levels on the Steam Workshop
